title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; chat, stream, and pull models via Ollama’s REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, chat, and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible API endpoint.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo for building RAG pipelines with Ollama embeddings and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands with role-based access control.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean Next.js chat interface for Ollama with Markdown rendering and conversation export.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile collection for Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, Zephyr, etc.

title: ollama-express
summary: Lightweight Express.js proxy that adds JWT auth & rate-limiting to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to run and chat with local Ollama models inside buffers with completion support.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration for Ollama4j—inject Ollama client as a bean with YAML config.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, dependency injection samples, and Blazor demo.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-powered AI commands for summarization and continuation.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-gradio
summary: Ready-to-run Gradio app for chatting with any Ollama model, including voice input via Whisper.
